description: Enterprise techniques used by Endpoint Denial of Service Mitigation, ATT&CK mitigation T1499 v1.0
name: Endpoint Denial of Service Mitigation (T1499)

techniques.comment: Leverage services provided by Content Delivery Networks (CDN) or providers specializing in DoS mitigations to filter traffic upstream from services.(Citation: CERT-EU DDoS March 2017) Filter boundary traffic by blocking source addresses sourcing the attack, blocking ports that are being targeted, or blocking protocols being used for transport. To defend against SYN floods, enable SYN Cookies.

To defend against SYN floods, enable SYN Cookies.
